```{r}
shinyApp(
  ####
  #UI#
  ####
  ui = fluidPage(
    theme = bs_theme(version = 4, bootswatch = "minty"),
    sidebarLayout(
      sidebarPanel(
        ChooseCountryListUI("1"),
        ChooseIndicatorListUI("2"),
        ChooseDateUI("3"),
        submitButton("Update View", icon("refresh"))
      ),
      mainPanel(tabsetPanel(
        type = "tabs",
        tabPanel("Custom"),
                 #withSpinner(tableOutput("table"), color = "#80c4ac")),
        tabPanel("Overview", plotOutput("plot")),
        tabPanel("XvsY")
      )),
    )
  ),
  ########
  #SERVER#
  ########
  server = function(input, output) {
    selectData <- reactive({
      WDI(
        country = ChooseCountryListServer("1")(),
        indicator = ChooseIndicatorListServer("2")(),
        start = ChooseDateServer("3")()[1],
        end = ChooseDateServer("3")()[2]
      )
    })
    
    output$plot <- renderPlot({
      plotdata<-melt(setDT(selectData()), id.vars = c("country","iso2c","iso3c","year"), variable.name = "indicator")
      plot<-plot(plotdata$year,plotdata$value)
      return(plot)
      })
  }
)
```
